articles.description: More popular than Picasso and Leonardo Da Vinci among AI artists, Greg Rutkowski opted out of the Stable Diffusion training set. The community just created a LoRA to mimic his style.

articles.description: Shibarium is one step closer to launch, and Doge-themed meme coins are reaping the benefits.

articles.description: Data indicates that activity on the layer-2 network has been increasing since Q2 2023, accelerated by the launch of Worldcoin.

articles.description: A blockchain architect expert told Decrypt that security in the DeFi industry demands a higher level of scrutiny from all participants.
articles.title: Introducing 'Standard on Security' Is Key to Thwarting DeFi Hacks: OpenZepplin Security Lead

articles.description: While the bipartisan effort is a key milestone, an upcoming showdown with the House may mean this policy never sees the light of day.
articles.title: Senate’s $886B Defense Bill Ropes in Crypto Mixers, Privacy Coins

articles.description: FTX claims Genesis owes it $2 billion while Genesis claims it owes nothing. A joint letter to the courts now suggests they’ve settled.
articles.title: Feuding Bankrupt Crypto Firms Genesis and FTX Reach in Principle Agreement

articles.description: Addressing the Commission’s allegations, Binance argues that the CFTC is inappropriately enforcing U.S. laws on overseas activities.
articles.title: Binance Accuses CFTC of Overreach in Motion to Dismiss Complaint

articles.description: Andreessen Horowitz wants to redefine the meaning of "companionship" with AI, and is providing the tools to make it happen.
articles.title: You Can Now Build Your Own AI Girlfriend—Here's How

articles.description: The firm is suing the SEC over denials to convert GBTC into a spot Bitcoin ETF.
articles.title: Grayscale Argues SEC Should Approve All Bitcoin ETFs at the Same Time

articles.description: MNTGE's Ethereum NFTs can be redeemed for patches from the likes of Jen Stark and OSF, along with Nyan Cat and Bored Ape Yacht Club artists.
articles.title: Fashion Brand MNTGE's New NFTs Unlock Physical Patches From Noted Artists

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: A Facebook group comprising 10,000 former NatWest customers is taking action against the bank's allegedly opaque debanking practices.
articles.title: NatWest Customer 'Debanked' for Crypto Trading Amid Nigel Farage Row

articles.description: House Republicans are pressing ahead with a bill to regulate stablecoins, but Democrats say that it's inadequate for the task.
articles.title: Stablecoin Bill Stymied, House Financial Services Chair Blames White House

articles.description: The Paraguay mining facility will come online in September, joining Sazmining’s existing facility in the U.S.
articles.title: Sazmining to Open Green Bitcoin Mining Facility in Paraguay, Tap Itaipu Dam

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: Android and iOS game EF Defense, from developers behind the popular Endless Fantasy game, will deploy on the Ethereum scaling network.
articles.title: 'EF Defense' Mobile Strategy Game Launching on Immutable zkEVM

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: To mark Beatport’s Web3 launch on Polkadot, it's issuing the limited collection ‘NACHTS’ from Berlin-based photographer Mischa Fanghaenel.
articles.title: Iconic Electronic Music Platform Beatport Launches NFT Marketplace on Polkadot

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.
articles.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.
articles.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.
articles.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.
articles.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect

articles.description: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.
articles.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.
articles.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.
articles.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder

articles.description: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
articles.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.
articles.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI

articles.description: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.
articles.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.
articles.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos

articles.description: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.
articles.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers

articles.description: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.
articles.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder

articles.description: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.
articles.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?

articles.description: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.
articles.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.
articles.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan
